title: MC_Jog (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_Jog
MC_Jog
causes a continuous motion on the axis.

rows.Name: JogForward
rows.Comment: TRUE: Axis is moved with the specified dynamic valuesVelocity,Acceleration,DecelerationandJerkin a positive direction.No motion is executed ifJogBackwardisTRUEat the same time.

rows: TRUE: Axis is moved with the specified dynamic valuesVelocity,Acceleration,DecelerationandJerkin a negative direction.No motion is executed ifJogForwardisTRUEat the same time.

rows.Name: Busy
rows.Comment: TRUE: Function block is in operation during an active motion afterJogForwardorJogBackwardhas been set.FALSE: Axis has been decelerated to velocity value zero afterJogForwardorJogBackwardhas been set toFALSE.

rows: TRUE: Execution is interrupted by another function block instance operating onAxis.CommandAbortedremains set as long asJogForwardorJogBackwardhas been set but for at least one cycle`.
TRUE: Error has occurred whileJogForwardorJogBackwardhas been set for at least one cycle.
